EdgeLink IoT Solutions - Service Tiers
- Lite Plan: $5.00/device per month (Up to 100 devices)
- Pro Plan: $3.50/device per month (101 to 500 devices)
- Enterprise: Custom pricing (Over 500 devices)

*Firmware Update (OTA) Fees: First 10MB per month is free. Each additional MB is charged at $0.05 per device.
*Security Add-on: $1.00/device per month. Provides automatic mitigation for known vulnerabilities (CVEs).

passages.title: Fleet Status Report - Project 'Aqua-Sense'
passages.footer: Total Managed Devices: 125 | Account Standing: Active

passages.content:
From: T. Sato <t.sato@embedded-dev.jp>
To: EdgeLink Support
Date: February 12

We have identified a critical security vulnerability (CVE-2026-102) affecting the v3.2.0 firmware on all our 125 devices. We need to deploy an emergency patch (v3.2.1, size: 5MB) by Friday. 

I have two questions:
1. Since our total device count recently changed, will our next bill reflect the lower per-device rate automatically?
2. We currently do not subscribe to the Security Add-on. If we activate it today, will the system automatically handle the deployment of this CVE patch, or do we still need to manage the OTA process manually for the 5MB file?

questions.q: What is the monthly base rate per device that the company is currently eligible for?
questions.explanation: 文書2のフッターに「Total Managed Devices: 125」とあります。文書1の料金表では、101〜500台は「Pro Plan」の$3.50が適用されるため、(B)が正解です。

questions.q: How much was the additional OTA fee for one AS-200 unit in the last update?
questions.explanation: 文書2より、AS-200のアップデートサイズは15MBでした。文書1の規定では、最初の10MBは無料で、超過分は1MBあたり$0.05です。超過分は 15 - 10 = 5MB なので、5 × $0.05 = $0.25 となり、(A)が正解です。

questions.q: Why is Mr. Sato contacting EdgeLink Support?
options: To report a hardware defect in the AS-100 model
To request a refund for an incorrect billing tier
To seek clarification on security patch procedures
To cancel the subscription for the Aqua-Sense project
questions.explanation: メール（文書3）で、脆弱性（CVE）へのパッチを当てる際に、セキュリティアドオンがどのように機能するか（自動か手動か）を確認しているため、(C)が正解です。

questions.q: What is implied about the company's current account configuration?
options: It already has the Security Add-on enabled.
It was recently charged for 150 devices.
It is running outdated firmware on its gateways.
It will pay more than $5.00 per device next month.
questions.explanation: メールで「v3.2.0に脆弱性が見つかった」「緊急パッチ(v3.2.1)を適用する必要がある」と述べており、文書2でも現行バージョンがv3.2.0であることが示されているため、(C)が正解です。
